title: Horizontal stretch or Vertical Compression?
text: Try to factor the $$\frac{1}{2}$$ that is in f(x) out first. Is this a horizontal stretch or a vertical compression?

title: Number's location
text: Where is the number being multiplied at? Inside the function or the outside? vertical compressionn is multipled outside and horizontal stretch is multiplied inside.

title: $$x+1$$ instead of $$x$$
text: What transformation is this? Think about how the graph will move, up and down, or left to right.

title: Subtraction of $$3$$
text: If $$3$$ is being subtracted at the end, what transformation is this? Are we moving up by three or down by three?
